keyFacts: LSJE, LLC is identified as an entity operating in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands, with an address at 6100 Red Hook Quarters.
Oriole Joseph was employed as maintenance staff by LSJE, LLC starting October 1, 2016.
The document is an emergency contact form dated March 19, 2018, indicating ongoing personnel management at the Virgin Islands location.
